thread.title: Seoul Sees Path for Peace Deal to Formally End Korean War

author: Andrew Jeong
title: Seoul Sees Path for Peace Deal to Formally End Korean War
text:
SEOUL—A South Korean official said Seoul could push for a more permanent peace agreement on the Korean Peninsula, potentially involving the U.S. and China, to replace the armistice that ended the Korean War.
Such a move could pave the way for a deal to end the standoff over North Korea’s nuclear weapons.
